data.title: At Home and Abroad: The Vietnam War on Film
data.meta_description: As we continue our extended examination of the implications of conflict, we present a collection of documentaries and essayistic works which reflect on U.S. involvement in the Vietnam War. While Vietnam has provided material for many compelling dramatic ...
